title: How to use gost2008s (gost) at Overleaf?
description: gost2008s.bst has already been installed on the Overleaf servers and is ready for use. Thus, in order to use the file in question, simply define the style directly in your document: \bibliographystyle{gost2008s} The file extension .bst can be omitted.
